Job Responsibilities:

Working within a fast growing team at KMS Technology, the winning candidate will join various software development projects. The responsibility includes: design, coding, troubleshooting and work with project team as well as customers on features/bug fixes. Our team has been working with lots of business domains such as Healthcare, Ecommerce, Mobile, e-Learning, Finances, etc

General requirements:

  •  Good English communication skills (especially reading and writing)
  • Likely having 3+ years of experience depending on how fast of your learning and developing technical capability
  • Ability to obtain deeply knowledge of the project technologies and work independently with minimum guidance
  • Ability to self-learn and adapt to new technologies quickly
  • Familiar with Agile development methodologies (Scrum, XP, Kanban)

Technical requirements:

  • Fluent in Java and J2EE technologies to develop web-based applications
  • Strong experience with OO design
  • Experience with applying design patterns
  • Good experience with unit testing: JUnit, mock
  • Strong experience with web-based technologies: Spring (Spring Core, Spring MVC, Spring Security, Spring Data)
  • Experience with ORM (JPA, Hibernate)
  • Experience with software development principles such as SOLID, DRY
  • Front-end: experience with JavaScript, JQuery, Bootstrap
  • Experience with writing efficient SQL queries
  • Experience with SCM such as SVN, Git

 Pluses:

  • Experience in Technical Lead role to lead a small team (4-5 members)
  • Experience with web/application server Tomcat, JBoss, Glassfish
  • Experience with Spring Integration
  • Experience with middleware EJB, JMS
  • Experience with JSF
  • Experience with AngularJS
  • Experience with build and deployment using Maven/Ant/Gradle
  • Experience with distributed system
  • Cloud computing, big data
  • DevOps experience
  • Domains: healthcare, e-commerce, e-Learning

Education/training preferred

  • Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline required
  • Advanced Degree and professional certifications are beneficial

We are embarking the journey of becoming the 1000 People Company in Y2019 and aiming for a bigger, stronger and better KMS Family as always.   • Proficient in one or more programming languages and platforms either Java or .NET as the primary platform
  • Perform exemplary work in terms of quality and level of skill/knowledge required
  • Good English communication skills
  • Good problem solving skills and presentation skills
  • Strong English written and oral communication skills and the ability to present to client’s technical leaders and executive team as well as participating online conferences in English
  • Nice to have:

– Competent in software development and agile development practices (SCRUM, Kanban, Lean…)
